main event: A telephone call reported seeing a 'flaming cross' moving slowly across the sky in Tuscaloosa, Alabama on 23 June 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as red in color,The object was not identified as an airplane,It was seen at an altitude of approximately 5,000 feet,The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes,The object disappeared into a thunderhead cloud.
witness description: reported by a telephone call to the local authorities
